replies.body: and then you accidentally press enter and type something....and it wastes your flash or something else...
that's true but if your paying attention to what you are doing that wont happen

so...if you set up this anti rage barrier....and then rage....you have to calm yourself enough BEFORE you rage....to not hit the barrier and waste flash or something else by mistakenly typing....while raging...

basically, "%%%% you" "do you even know what you are doing?"
bam, 2 common rage quotes that instantly use the D or F....

causing more rage...

overall, its a good idea...but only if you are a seldom rager and dont want to push yourself over the edge with reports. or just dont want to communicate with your team and then get reported for that and banned for longer than most abuse bans go for...
also not everyone uses the default d and f keys for spells in my case i have the d and f keys rebound to keys on my mouse so even if i press d or f nothing will happen

again, your arguement is that you changed setup....and that makes this changed set up work.

a lot of works have R in it...what if you waste R while trying to type while raging?
what do you use instead of D and F? those are the DEFAULT so most people use them. so rebinding enter can cause issues if people try to type while raging and they waste summoners.

just because you use it and it works...doesnt mean ANYONE gives a flying %%%% about your poor attempt at rebinding to avoid raging in chat.

I understand where your coming from i only posted this because i found it and it has helped me personally
I know that i cant type in chat so i don't press enter i just look stupid throwing a fit over a game
I only made this info available because it helped me in my situation and if someone happens to be in the same boat im in then here is everything you need 
you don't have to use this method everyone deals with anger differently for me this works and if it can help someone else then im all for it.
Or you could just learn to not be a toxic %%%%.
